title: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Man of Medan + DLC + Videos Fix + Online Co-Op
body:
The Dark Pictures Anthology: Man of Medan + DLC + Videos Fix + Online Co-Op


Genres/Tags: Interactive movie, QTE, Third-person, 3D, Horror
Companies: Supermassive Games
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI13
Original Size: 35.2 GB
Repack Size: from 17.8 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on The_Dark_Pictures_Anthology_Man_of_Medan-HOODLUM ISO release: hlm-thed.iso (37,791,641,600 bytes)
  • Broken video files have been fixed
  • Curator’s Cut DLC is included and activated
  • The.Dark.Pictures.Anthology.Man.of.Medan.Online-Fix is available in NoDVD folder after installation, allowing online co-op via Steam with the same crack users. Thanks to deadmau5 and BzinhoGames!
  • 100% Lossless, but NOT MD5 Perfect: video files have been fixed to be playable in-game. All other files are MD5 perfect ONLY when installed with all languages – consider it if you plan to apply future updates
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of voiceover packs you don’t need and “Special Features” videos. English voiceovers and all text translations are included by default
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 35.2 to 17.8~22.1 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~15 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~25 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 63 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Repack by FitGirl

Game Description

The Dark Pictures Anthology is a series of stand-alone, branching cinematic horror games featuring a multiplayer mode.

In Man of Medan, five friends set sail on a holiday diving trip that soon changes into something much more sinister…

Embark on a horrific journey aboard a ghost ship.

Experience your terrifying story with a friend online or go for safety in numbers with up to five players offline

All playable characters can live or die. The choices you make will decide their fate.

Who will you save?

Don’t. Play. Alone.

You can skip downloading and installing of voiceover packs you don’t need and “Special Features” videos. English voiceovers and all text translations are included by default. Here’s the list of optional files:

  • fg-optional-documentaries.bin
  • fg-optional-french.bin
  • fg-optional-german.bin
  • fg-optional-italian.bin
  • fg-optional-russian.bin
  • fg-optional-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers and don’t need “Special Features” videos – skip all “optional” files, but download fg-optional-spanish.bin & all main files (01-06).

If you skip downloading and installing of fg-optional-documentaries.bin, you can watch all “Special Features” videos on YouTube.

In game those videos become available in a separate menu option after completing the story and collecting secrets.

1 Creating the Curator
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ium1tK3JvTk

2 The History of Anthological Horror
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=znFgIg1PYXU

3 Playing the Fool [Shawn Ashmore]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wLb83mwLYZI

4 Little Hope Trailer [Hidden Ending]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xSytATmTF1U
